subject: Bruce Stewart
body:
Bruce Stewart
Nedbank International Remittance, Johannesburg , South Africa
135 Rivonia Road, Sandown, Sandton, 2196, South Africa.
Postal Address: PO Box 1144
Direct line : +27-639548208
Email  : 
nedbanktransfer@safrica.com
 
 
Good Day  Sir,
 
Thank you for Contacting Nedbank Group ,South Africa, a Global Bank, Be advised that anastasia said she want you to receive her money and help her leave Ukraine, you cant tell me to Cancel the transaction when she said she want her money released to you, you need to look for any Identity to email to me to enable me Open a file in your name as the Beneficiary of the funds US$12.922Million awaiting to be released to you Sir.
 
you wil have the receivers account to transfer the TRUST FUND INSURANCE ACCOUNT FEE, as soon as i have Open a file in your name. this is the procedures and you are advised to comply with it for the transfer follow up.
 Regards
Bruce Stewart.
Nedbank International Remittance, Johannesburg , South Africa
135 Rivonia Road, Sandown, Sandton, 2196, South Africa.
Postal Address: PO Box 1144
Direct line : +27-639548208
Email  : 
nedbanktransfer@safrica.com
CONFIDENTIALITY NOTICE: This email and any attachments are for the exclusive and confidential use of the intended recipient. If you are not the intended recipient, please do not read, distribute or take action in reliance upon this message. If you have received this in error, please notify us immediately by return email and promptly delete this message and its attachments from your computer system. We do not waive attorney-client or work product privilege by the transmission of this message. Nedbank south Africa ,requires full adherence to this policy,

subject: Re:   Bruce Stewart
body:
Hello Bruce Stewart,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your response. However, I must admit that I am a bit confused about the situation you mentioned regarding Anastasia and her money. Can you please provide me with more details about this? How did she come to choose me specifically to receive her money and help her leave Ukraine? 

Also, could you clarify what you mean by "look for any Identity to email to me"? What kind of identity are you referring to?

I want to make sure I understand the procedures correctly before proceeding further. Thank you for your assistance.

Best wishes,
Kenneth
